name: Re:Active
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

E to interact

Left Shift to dash

Left Mouse Button to use the Grappling Hook

ESC to pause the game

What happens when you take a long nap? Your entire planet gets destroyed. To fix your home, you need to travel to different planets to reclaim lost treasure to fix your home. While exploring these distant planets, you can interact with the various inhabitants or even collect new abilities. Will you be able to fix your home planet?

After Playing the game please fill out this form to give us feedback.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIDHAYmfNeqXPd_EVVw6VKuCV9F8sH2F-pQEaw...
